LanguageData.COMIGO_AdvancedPasteDispenser.label: advanced paste dispensers
LanguageData.COMIGO_AdvancedPasteDispenser.descriptio: Research into dietology and molecular analysis to create even more effective ways of automated food production.
LanguageData.COMIGO_CompactCookingStovesResearch.desc: Research into space-efficient heating components that allow more compact variants of cooking sites, with an oven and hotplates combined into a single device.
LanguageData.COMIGO_CompactPasteDispenser.label: compact paste dispenser
LanguageData.COMIGO_CompactPasteDispenser.description: Revisit the previous design of a paste dispenser to greatly reduce the space occupied by this machine. The new model will require a more skilled builder.
LanguageData.COMIGO_CuttingBoardResearch.label: cutting board
LanguageData.COMIGO_CuttingBoardResearch.description: Create less efficient but small cutting boards that are light and can fit in a travel bag with all the knives, perfect for caravans.
LanguageData.COMIGO_InWallPasteDispenser.label: in-wall dispensers
LanguageData.COMIGO_InWallPasteDispenser.description: Shrink the occupied volume to an absurdly small amount, making paste dispensers fit into walls at the cost of a bit less efficient ingredient consumption. Perfect for feeding prisoners!
LanguageData.COMIGO_PortableChemfuelStove_Research.de: Design a portable device for cooking to be used in caravans and as a replacement to fuel or electric stoves.
LanguageData.COMIGO_SmallerBreweryResearch.label: smaller brewery
LanguageData.COMIGO_SmallerBreweryResearch.descriptio: Develop a more compact brewery, for your drunken needs.
LanguageData.COMIGO_SmallerButcherTableResearch.label: smaller butcher table
LanguageData.COMIGO_SmallerButcherTableResearch.descr: Sharp blades and saws, shelves, and meat hooks will allow for smaller butcher tables.
